headline: 3M appoints Meagan Linn as Senior Vice President, Government Affairs
summary: 3M today announced the appointment of Meagan Linn as Senior Vice President, Government Affairs. In this role, Linn will oversee the company's engagement with the executive branch, policymakers, regulatory agencies, and industry associations, globally to advance public policy dialogue. She will also be responsible for developing business growth through government contracts.
